#Linear Model
Dependent:
Total clicks

Independent:
Number of job postings
Number of job-seekers
Indeed exposure
Internet Access

```{r}
clickModel <- lm(stateClicks ~ 0 + jobPostings + populationTotal + unemployedPop,data= indeedState)
summary(clickModel)

```

```{r}
clickModel <- lm(cityClicks ~ 0 + jobPostings,data= indeedCity)
summary(clickModel)

```

```{r}
clickModel <- lm(cityClicks ~ jobPostings + unemployedPop + populationTotal,data= indeedCity)
summary(clickModel)

```

```{r}
clickModel <- lm(stateClicks ~ 0 + jobPostings,data= indeedState)
summary(clickModel)
```
